question:
Which of the following statements are correct about the Johannesburg Summit?
1. The Johannesburg Plan of Implementation was agreed at the World Summit on Sustainable Development or the Earth
Summit 2005.
2. It affirmed UN commitment to ‘full implementation’ of Agenda 21, alongside achievement of the Millennium Development Goals and other international agreements.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
The Johannesburg Plan of Implementation was agreed at the World Summit on Sustainable Development or the Earth
Summit 2002. It affirmed UN commitment to ‘full implementation’ of Agenda 21, alongside achievement of the Millennium Development Goals and other international agreements.
